nodes.text: Merenzane Gold was an expensive liquor, commonly selling for more than one hundred credits a bottle. Wuher claimed to serve it at the Mos Eisley Cantina. However, one of his regular customers, Kardue'sai'Malloc, described Wuher's Merenzane Gold as a poor imitation which came from "bottles that once, eons ago, were looked at hard by a man who heard of Merenzane!"
Wuher did have a bottle of the genuine article, however. He once poured Kardue'sai'Malloc a drink from it, to welcome him back to the bar after he had recovered from a severe beating.
In the comic Legacy 37, Merenzane Gold was erroneously referred to as "Merazane Gold". Then in the following issue Merenzane Gold was mentioned again, where it was spelled correctly.
